message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. I'm willing to offer you the product for $18,000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $10,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $18,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $14,000. This is a great compromise that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $14,000 is still a little bit of a stretch for me. How about we settle at $11,500? That seems like a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I understand that $11,500 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product for $13,000. This is a fair price that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.

Hi Alice, thanks for continuing to work with me.  While $13,000 is closer to what I had in mind, I think I can only make this work at $12,000. I understand that's a significant reduction from your initial offer, but I hope you see it as a fair deal.

Hi Bob, I understand that $12,000 is a significant reduction, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product for $12,500. This is a fair price that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.
